verses.verse: To the <S%G32>angel<s%> of the <S%G1577>church<s%> in <S%G2179>Ephesus<s%> <S%G1125>write<s%>: These <S%G3592>things<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> he that <S%G2902>holdeth<s%> the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G792>stars<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> right <S%G1188>hand<s%>, he that <S%G4043>walketh<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3319>midst<s%> of the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G5552>golden<s%> <S%G3087>candlesticks<s%>:

I <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G2873>toil<s%> and2532, 4675 <S%G5281>patience<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> thou <S%G1410>canst<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G941>bear<s%> <S%G2556>evil<s%> <S%G2532>men<s%>, and didst <S%G3985>try<s%> them that <S%G5335>call<s%> <S%G1511>themselves<s%> <S%G652>apostles<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G1511>are<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> didst <S%G2147>find<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G5571>false<s%>;

and <S%G2532><s%> thou <S%G2192>hast<s%> <S%G5281>patience<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> didst <S%G941>bear<s%> <S%G1223>for<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%>'s <S%G1223>sake<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2577>hast<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> grown <S%G2577>weary<s%>.
But <S%G235><s%> I <S%G2192>have<s%> this <S%G2596>against<s%> <S%G4675>thee<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> thou didst <S%G863>leave<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G26>love<s%>.

Remember <S%G3421><s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G4159>whence<s%> thou art <S%G1601>fallen<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3340>repent<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> the <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%>; or <S%G4190>else<s%> I <S%G2064>come<s%> to <S%G4671>thee<s%>, <S%G5035><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> will <S%G2795>move<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G3087>candlestick<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>its<s%> <S%G5117>place<s%>, <S%G3362>except<s%> thou <S%G3340>repent<s%>.

But <S%G235><s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> thou <S%G2192>hast<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> thou <S%G3404>hatest<s%> the <S%G2041>works<s%> of the <S%G3531>Nicolaitans<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%> I <S%G2504>also<s%> <S%G3404>hate<s%>.

He that <S%G2192>hath<s%> an <S%G3775>ear<s%>, let him <S%G191>hear<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> to the <S%G1577>churches<s%>. To <S%G846>him<s%> that <S%G3528>overcometh<s%>, to him will I <S%G1325>give<s%> to <S%G5315>eat<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G3586>tree<s%> of <S%G2222>life<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3319>the<s%> <S%G3857>Paradise<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> to the <S%G32>angel<s%> of the <S%G1577>church<s%> in <S%G4668>Smyrna<s%> <S%G1125>write<s%>: These <S%G3592>things<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> the <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2078>last<s%>, <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G1096>was<s%> <S%G3498>dead<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> lived <S%G2198>again<s%>:

I <S%G1492>know<s%> thy4675, Exodus41, 2532 <S%G2347>tribulation<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> thy <S%G4432>poverty<s%> <S%G1161>(but<s%> thou <S%G1488>art<s%> <S%G4145>rich<s%>), <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G988>blasphemy<s%> of them <S%G3588>that<s%> <S%G3004>say<s%> <S%G1438>they<s%> <S%G1511>are<s%> <S%G2453>Jews<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1438>they<s%> art <S%G3756>not<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> are a <S%G4864>synagogue<s%> of <S%G4567>Satan<s%>.

Fear <S%G5399><s%> <S%G3367>not<s%> the things <S%G3739>which<s%> thou art <S%G3195>about<s%> to <S%G3958>suffer<s%>: <S%G2400>behold<s%>, the <S%G1228>devil<s%> is <S%G3195>about<s%> to <S%G906>cast<s%> some <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G5438>prison<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> ye may be <S%G3985>tried<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> ye shall <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G2347>tribulation<s%> <S%G1176>ten<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%>. Be <S%G1096>thou<s%> <S%G4103>faithful<s%> <S%G891>unto<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> I will <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G4671>thee<s%> the <S%G4735>crown<s%> of <S%G2222>life<s%>.

He that <S%G2192>hath<s%> an <S%G3775>ear<s%>, let him <S%G191>hear<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> to the <S%G1577>churches<s%>. He that <S%G3528>overcometh<s%> <S%G91>shall<s%> <S%G3364>not<s%> be <S%G91>hurt<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G1208>second<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%>.

and <S%G2532><s%> to the <S%G32>angel<s%> of the <S%G1577>church<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4010>Pergamum<s%> <S%G1125>write<s%>: These <S%G3592>things<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> he that <S%G2192>hath<s%> <S%G4501>the<s%> <S%G3691>sharp<s%> <S%G1366>two-edged<s%> <S%G4501>sword<s%>:

I <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G4226>where<s%> thou <S%G2730>dwellest<s%>, even <S%G3699>where<s%> <S%G4567>Satan<s%>'s <S%G2362>throne<s%> <S%G2532>is<s%>; and thou holdest <S%G2902>fast<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G720>didst<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G720>deny<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%>, <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the days2250, 1722 <S%G3739>of<s%> <S%G493>Antipas<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3144>witness<s%>, <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G4103>faithful<s%> <S%G3739>one<s%>, who was <S%G615>killed<s%> <S%G3844>among<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%>, <S%G3699>where<s%> <S%G4567>Satan<s%> <S%G2730>dwelleth<s%>.

But <S%G235><s%> I <S%G2192>have<s%> a few <S%G3641>things<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> <S%G4675>thee<s%>, <S%G3754>because<s%> thou <S%G2192>hast<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> some that <S%G2902>hold<s%> the <S%G1322>teaching<s%> of <S%G903>Balaam<s%>, <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G1321>taught<s%> <S%G904>Balak<s%> to <S%G906>cast<s%> a <S%G4625>stumblingblock<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> the <S%G5207>children<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel<s%>, to <S%G5315>eat<s%> things sacrificed to <S%G1494>idols<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> to commit <S%G4203>fornication<s%>.
So <S%G3779><s%> <S%G2192>hast<s%> <S%G4771>thou<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> some that <S%G2902>hold<s%> the <S%G1322>teaching<s%> of the <S%G3531>Nicolaitans<s%> in <S%G3739>like<s%> <S%G3404>manner<s%>.

Repent <S%G3340><s%> <S%G1487>therefore<s%>; or else3361, 1161 I <S%G2064>come<s%> to <S%G4671>thee<s%> <S%G5035>quickly<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> I will make <S%G4170>war<s%> <S%G3326>against<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> the <S%G4501>sword<s%> <S%G4750>of<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G4750>mouth<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> to the <S%G32>angel<s%> of the <S%G1577>church<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2363>Thyatira<s%> <S%G1125>write<s%>: These <S%G3592>things<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, who <S%G2192>hath<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3788>eyes<s%> <S%G5613>like<s%> a <S%G5395>flame<s%> of <S%G4442>fire<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4228>feet<s%> are <S%G3664>like<s%> unto burnished <S%G5474>brass<s%>:

I <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G26>love<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2041>ministry<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5281>patience<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> that <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G2078>last<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%> are <S%G4119>more<s%> than the <S%G4413>first<s%>.

But <S%G235><s%> I <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3641>this<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> <S%G4675>thee<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> thou <S%G1439>sufferest<s%> the <S%G1135>woman<s%> <S%G2403>Jezebel<s%>, who <S%G3004>calleth<s%> <S%G1438>herself<s%> a <S%G4398>prophetess<s%>; and she <S%G1321>teacheth<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4105>seduceth<s%> <S%G1699>my<s%> <S%G1401>servants<s%> to commit <S%G4203>fornication<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G5315>eat<s%> things sacrificed to <S%G1494>idols<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> I <S%G1325>gave<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G5550>time<s%> that she <S%G2443>should<s%> <S%G3340>repent<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> she willeth <S%G3756>not<s%> to <S%G3340>repent<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G4202>fornication<s%>.

Behold <S%G2400><s%>, <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G906>cast<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> a <S%G2825>bed<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> them that commit <S%G3431>adultery<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G2347>tribulation<s%>, except1437, 3361 they <S%G3340>repent<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> to <S%G5213>you<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%>, <S%G2532>to<s%> the <S%G3062>rest<s%> that are <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2363>Thyatira<s%>, <S%G3745>as<s%> many <S%G3745>as<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1322>teaching<s%>, <S%G3748>who<s%> <S%G1097>know<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> the deep <S%G899>things<s%> of <S%G4567>Satan<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> they are wont to <S%G3004>say<s%>; I <S%G906>cast<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G3756>none<s%> <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G922>burden<s%>.
Nevertheless <S%G4133><s%> that <S%G3739>which<s%> ye <S%G2192>have<s%>, hold <S%G2902>fast<s%> till3739, Leviticus2 I <S%G2240>come<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he that <S%G3528>overcometh<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> he that <S%G5083>keepeth<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%> <S%G891>unto<s%> the <S%G5056>end<s%>, to <S%G846>him<s%> will I <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G1849>authority<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> the <S%G1484>nations<s%>:

and <S%G2532><s%> he shall <S%G4165>rule<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> a <S%G4464>rod<s%> of <S%G4603>iron<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> the <S%G4632>vessels<s%> of the <S%G2764>potter<s%> are broken to <S%G4937>shivers<s%>; <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G2504>I<s%> also have <S%G2983>received<s%> <S%G3844>of<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3962>Father<s%>:
and <S%G2532><s%> I will <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G792>the<s%> <S%G4407>morning<s%> <S%G792>star<s%>.
